SELECT ord_num, ord_name, ord_phone, to_char(ord_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ord_date, ord_status, ord_trn, m_id FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, ord_num, ord_name, ord_phone, ord_date, ord_status, ord_trn, m_id FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN member m ON ol.m_num = m.m_num WHERE
rownum <= #{cnt} - ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}) ORDER BY rownum DESC ) orderList WHERE rnum > #{cnt} - (#{pageNum} * #{amount})

SELECT ord_name, ord_phone, ord_email, sh_name, sh_residence, sh_phone, sh_request, pay_method, pay_price FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN shipping sh ON ol.ord_num = sh.ord_num INNER JOIN payment pay ON ol.ord_num = pay.ord_num WHERE ol.ord_num = #{ord_num}

SELECT img_prd, prd_name, prd_price, ord_qty FROM order_detail od INNER JOIN product prd ON od.prd_num = prd.prd_num INNER JOIN product_image pimg ON prd.prd_num = pimg.prd_num WHERE ord_num = #{ord_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN member m ON ol.m_num = m.m_num
